formatted_address: 160 Robinson Rd, #03-02 SBF Medical Center, Singapore 068914
name: The Belle Clinic

reviews.text: Amazing first experience, was made to feel so welcome and comfortable. Would highly recommend Dr Maybelle to all.She always have a best and advance solutions for my problems. Very kind and helpful therapists.Happy to visit Dr Maybelle and will continue my treatment with them.üòç‚ù§Ô∏è

Highly recommend this practice. Dr Maybelle is fantastic, I have recommended many friends to the practice. Also the team are brilliant - really know what they are doing and provide excellent service and care. Could it recommend more highly.

Dr Maybelle always recommends what she feels is best for the patient no more no less. She is attentive to the patients needs and aims to address the root cause instead of superficially addressing the issues.

The staff are very attentive and accommodating.
Dr Maybelle and her team are my go to for all skin related treatments, always professional and friendly and I come away with results better than I expected and always happy. Best in Singapore!

Dr. Maybelle is a highly knowledgeable and skilled practitioner with a warm and caring bedside manner. She took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly explain all the options available to me. Her professionalism and compassion make her a top choice for anyone seeking exceptional care. Thank you!
